message:
Hey Stephen

Thanks for the great blog and series.
For the first code block you are explaining how it ignores any OperationCanceledException's.
Might there be a mistake?
The exception is ignored in the sense of not catching it, it will be thrown further up the chain.
As I understand it, the "catch ()" and "when ()" are not in a "when, then" but more in a "if and if" relationship.

Thanks again

Patrick
